p: MPV lacks genes present in other paramyxoviruses that inhibit interferon responses; nevertheless, MPV is capable of blocking type I interferon responses by an unknown mechanism [ 317, 318]. MPV and other respiratory viruses induce pulmonary CD8+ T cells that fail to secrete IFNÎ³ or exhibit cytotoxic degranulation in response to viral peptides; these impaired CD8 T cells resemble exhausted CD8 T cells induced by chronic infections such as HIV and hepatitis C virus [ 319].
